peregrine.os
Class MappedFileReader

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.util.IdempotentFunction<java.lang.Object,java.io.IOException>
      peregrine.util.IdempotentCloser
          peregrine.os.BaseMappedFile
              peregrine.os.MappedFileReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
public class MappedFileReader
extends BaseMappedFile
implements java.io.Closeable

Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources in the foreground via close() without having to wait for the GC.
